articles.title: Singapore-Made 'Skull & Bones' Offers Distinct Southeast Asian Flavour, And It's About Time - Geek Culture
articles.description: With Skull & Bones taking place in the Indian Ocean, it represents a great opportunity for the region's culture to shine on a big stage.
articles.content: Although Ubisoft‘s Skull & Bones has been mired in what many would term “development hell,” the opportunity to create not just an original IP, but one that hits close to home meant that the Ubiso… [+5250 chars]

articles.title: Vosotros tows Gilas Men 3x3 to Asia Cup main draw; Gilas Women bow out - Rappler
articles.description: PBA 3x3 champion guard Almond Vosotros showcases his stellar outside shooting to lift Gilas Pilipinas to the 2022 FIBA 3x3 Asia Cup main draw
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines Gilas Pilipinas Men marched to the 2022 FIBA 3×3 Asia Cup with a pair of wins against Jordan and Indonesia in the qualifying draw on Thursday, July 7 in Singapore.
